org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl
Interface IAeBpelObject

All Superinterfaces:
IAeLocatableObject
All Known Subinterfaces:
IAeActivity, IAeActivityParent, IAeBusinessProcessInternal, IAeDynamicScopeParent, IAeEventParent, IAeExecutableBpelObject, IAeFaultHandler, IAeLoopActivity, IAeLoopControl, IAeWSIOActivity
All Known Implementing Classes:
AeAbstractBpelObject, AeActivityFlowImpl, AeActivityForEachImpl, AeActivityForEachParallelImpl, AeActivityImpl, AeActivityParent, AeActivityPickImpl, AeActivityReceiveImpl, AeActivityScopeImpl, AeActivitySequenceImpl, AeActivityWhileImpl, AeBusinessProcess, AeDefaultFaultHandler, AeEventHandlersContainer, AeLoopActivity, AeLoopControl, AeOnEvent, AeOnMessage, AeRepeatableOnAlarm, AeWSIOActivityImpl
public interface IAeBpelObject
extends IAeLocatableObject

Base interface for Bpel object implementations.

getState

public AeBpelState getState()
Returns the current state

getParent

public IAeBpelObject getParent()
All implementation objects except the process will have a parent activity.

getChildrenForStateChange

public java.util.Iterator getChildrenForStateChange()
Returns an Iterator for the bpel object's child objects which participate in the state change propagation. For structured activities, this merely returns an Iterator for the child activity or activities. In some cases though, like Scope, we're returning objects in addition to the single child activity. This is because scope needs to propagate the

Returns:
Iterator containing IAeBpelObjets

findVariable

public IAeVariable findVariable(java.lang.String aName)
Gets a variable by name. If the object implementing this interface is a scope or process then it'll check to see if it owns the variable, otherwise the request should propogate up to the parent activity.

findPartnerLink

public AePartnerLink findPartnerLink(java.lang.String aName)
Gets the partnerLink by name

getProcess

public IAeBusinessProcessInternal getProcess()
Getter for the owning process.

findCorrelationSet

public AeCorrelationSet findCorrelationSet(java.lang.String aName)
Finds the correlation set by name. If the activity does not define this correlation set then it will keep walking up the parent hierarchy until it is resolved.

isSuppressJoinConditionFailure

public boolean isSuppressJoinConditionFailure()
Returns the suppress join condition attribute for this bpel object. This attribute is configurable at the activity level and inherited from the parent object unless it is overridden.

translateNamespacePrefixToUri

public java.lang.String translateNamespacePrefixToUri(java.lang.String aPrefix)
Returns the namespace associated with the prefix from the associated model.

isReadyToExecute

public boolean isReadyToExecute()
All implementions should return true. Only activities may not be ready as a result of links not being ready.

isNotDeadPath

public boolean isNotDeadPath()
                      throws AeBusinessProcessException
All non-activity implementions should return true. Only activities may not execute as a result of link status or join conditions being false.

Throws:
AeBusinessProcessException

              throws AeBusinessProcessException

isTerminatable

public boolean isTerminatable()
Returns true if the child is in a state that can be terminated.

isTerminating

public boolean isTerminating()
Returns true if the object is currently in the process of terminating.
